summary:
(RAG Format)
The patient is a 44-year-old woman presenting with significant frustration regarding her interactions with specific patients, particularly a long-term borderline patient whose sessions consistently overrun. The patient expresses a sense of professional exhaustion, feelings of being emotionally drained, and a growing sense of self-doubt in her therapeutic efficacy. Additionally, she reflects on her own loneliness and perceived destiny of remaining alone, noting a tendency to seek guidance from psychic readings, despite recognizing their inconsistency.
main_issues: - Professional burnout and frustration with challenging patients
- Sense of emotional exhaustion and self-doubt in professional efficacy
- Persistent feelings of loneliness and existential questioning
- Overreliance on external guidance (psychics) as a coping mechanism
- Difficulty setting boundaries with demanding patients
limiting_beliefs: - 'If I set boundaries, I will lose my patients.'
- 'Other people's needs are more important than my own.'
therapeutic_goals: - Develop effective boundary-setting strategies to manage demanding patients
- Implement self-care routines to reduce emotional exhaustion
- Encourage self-reflection on limiting beliefs surrounding loneliness and self-worth
- Foster detachment from psychic readings as a source of validation

immediate: - Grounding exercises for emotional regulation post-session
- Journaling to externalize frustration and clarify boundaries
- Hypnosis session recommendation: Emotional Reset and Self-Worth Anchoring
intermediate: - Develop assertiveness scripts to manage patient overstepping
- Reframe limiting beliefs about professional efficacy
- Guided visualization to reinforce personal boundaries
long_term: - Integrate regular self-care check-ins to monitor emotional depletion
- Develop a plan for reducing reliance on external validation (psychics)
- Establish a mentorship connection for professional support

motivational_closure: You are allowed to take up space. Your boundaries are valid, and your needs matter. You are not here to save everyone, but to offer guidance from a place of grounded presence.
